metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare + Google Cloud Platform | Cloud Services
metaTags.metaDescription: The flexibility of Google Cloud Platform cloud services coupled with the power and protection of Cloudflare is just a button-click away.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare + Google Cloud Platform
relatedBlades.subtitle: Improve the security and performance of Google Cloud Platform hosted Internet applications & APIs
relatedBlades.copy:
![cloudflare-google-cloud](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/4O9282QjKUisMGQuesEEEU/353d96fb56d78cbd070f770a7b953925/cloudflare-google.png)

Cloudflare offers a comprehensive set of security and performance services, protecting Google Cloud-hosted Internet properties from: DDoS Attack, Customer Data Breach, and Malicious Bot Abuse, while accelerating web and mobile performance and ensuring availability.

relatedBlades.quote: "Knowing that we don't have to worry about DDoS attacks against our API and gateway servers gives us the peace of mind to focus on improving our product."

features.description: savings on Google Cloud Network Egress billing

features.title: 2 million / second
features.description: spikes of websockets events while remaining fast

relatedBlades.title: Seamless Integration with Cloud Security Command Center
relatedBlades.copy: Google Cloud's Cloud Security Command Center (CSCC) is the canonical security and data risk database for Google Cloud Platform. CSCC Unifies: Assets, resources, policies, IAM policies, findings, security and risk specific annotations all in one place, enabling security and data risk insights, management and recommendations. Cloudflare is one of the first security providers incorporated into CSCC. Though the CSCC dashboard, insights into top threats, threat types, and firewall events from Cloudflare are displayed alongside other security application metrics, for a holistic view into web application security posture. Google Cloud Security Command Center integration is available for Cloudflare customers with the Enterprise plan. Before enabling Cloudflare with CSCC, you'll need to [request access](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/).

image.description: Screenshot of Cloudflare incorporated into Google Cloud's Security Command Center

relatedBlades.title: Google Cloud CDN Interconnect Program
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare customers with Internet properties hosted in Google Cloud Platform automatically have this program enabled. Google Cloud-hosted websites benefit from reductions in bandwidth, up to 75% savings on egress pricing, and faster connections between Cloudflare and Google Cloud origin servers.

Additional performance services include Argo Smart Routing, load balancing with geo-steering, and website optimizations, which improve web and mobile experiences and ensure website and application availability.

relatedBlades.quote: "The reason we use Cloudflare is because the security features are excellent, the CDN (Content Delivery Network) is high performing, and it's really convenient that these solutions are packaged together. It makes managing everything easy, and allows us to focus on our core business."

features.title: Saved 50%
features.description: on their monthly Google Cloud Network Egress Bill

relatedBlades.title: DDoS Mitigation for Layers 3, 4, 7, and DNS
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's network capacity is %{NetworkCapacityLargestDDOS} bigger than the largest DDoS attack ever recorded. With %{NetworkCapacity} of capacity, it can handle any modern distributed attack, including those targeting layers 3, 4, and 7, as well as DNS infrastructure.

Cloudflare offers unmetered mitigation of distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks for Google Cloud hosted web applications and APIs, regardless of the size of attack, with no additional costs, caps, or overages.

relatedBlades.title: Prevent Customer Data Breach
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare prevents breaches of sensitive customer data on Google Cloud hosted Internet applications and APIs through a variety of security services, including SSL/TLS 1.3, DNSSEC, web application firewall (WAF), rate limiting, and IP reputation database.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more about data breach prevention

relatedBlades.title: Key Features
keyFeature: CDN with flat-rate bandwidth pricing
Latest web standards (HTTP/2, AMP, Gzip, and TLS 1.3)
Cloudflare Logs analysis using Big Query and Data Studios
Multi-cloud strategy with Kubernetes and global load balancing
